meanings.definition: Relating to or performed with an ophthalmoscope.
meanings.sent1: The ophthalmoscopic examination helped the doctor see inside the eye.
meanings.sent2: The ophthalmoscopic device allowed the optometrist to view the retina.
meanings.sent3: During the ophthalmoscopic check-up, the eye tried to play hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Her ophthalmoscopic vision revealed the secrets hidden within the eye.
meanings.sent5: The ophthalmoscopic procedure illuminated the inner workings of the eye.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the examination of the interior of the eye using an ophthalmoscope.
meanings.sent1: The ophthalmoscopic test provided a detailed look at the eye's interior.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use ophthalmoscopic techniques to study eye diseases.
meanings.sent3: The ophthalmoscopic inspection turned the eye into a mysterious cave.
meanings.sent4: His ophthalmoscopic gaze penetrated deep into the eye's mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The ophthalmoscopic exploration uncovered hidden treasures within the eye.
